details.name: Get trending news articles and create a HTML table using Python
details.details:
Explores the usage of :
  • Calling third party APIs using Python
  • Using Python packages for operations like creating a HTML page
  • Making Python scripts loosely coupled for easier extension
  • Unit testing Python code
  • Shell script to run the Python script

details.name: A bot with intelligence derived from the LUIS framework and integrating with Dynamics CRM to perform simple operations
details.details:
Explores the usage of :
  • Microsoft Bot framework to create conversational agents
  • Using the LUIS framework to gather intents from the conversations
  • Integrate with Dynamics CRM (Microsoft's CRM solution) to process the intent

details.name: A Google chrome extension to remove 'Sarahah' app posts from Facebook news feed.
details.details:
Sarahah app was viral during July-October 2017. However, I did not like these posts in my Facebook feed when browsing through Facebook in my PC, so created this extension to remove these posts. It used:
  • JavaScript to build a polling Google chrome extension and filtering posts based on keyword
  • A simple OCR processor using Python and Py tesseract package that could read text from images

details.name: A simulator for a temporal language called Tempura
details.details: This was my undergraduate project where we built a lexer and parser for programs written in Tempura language. A module was also built that would execute the Tempura code after interpreting it and generate diagrams illustrating the execution of the Tempura program.

details.name: A Python application to gather insights from WhatsApp conversations.
details.details: The application will help the user to easily print messages from a Python conversation as a HTML page with built in functionality to perform a search on the messages and see only the messages that might be relevant for the user. The application follows OOPs patterns and is designed to be easily extensible with new functionality.

details.name: A web app to showcase my own professional and academic journey
details.details: This app is built using AngularJS where data from JSON is fed into the angular app. The design is extensible and the content of the web app can easily be updated by updating the JSON data. It can then be hosted as a GITHUB pages application just like this one!!
